attributes.action: Take the education crisis in our country seriously!
attributes.background: The UK has a huge teacher shortage which is only appearing to get worse. The British education system has always been something of envy to the rest of the world, now just like our NHS it is crumbling around us. Don't allow this crisis to continue and sacrifice our children's education any more!

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. If you 're concerned about teachers leaving the profession, you could start a petition calling for a specific policy change which you think would improve the situation.
